name: Through Colors Project
description:
Through Colors Project is a Climbing-Platformer game where we play as a little bear. This little bear got lost searching for a magic gauntlet. After he found it the place became his enemy. The spirits who guard the gauntlet became hostile against him. Now he's looking for his way back to home. 

Controls:

- Keyboard: A/D - Movement, Space Bar - Jump, J - Hook, K - Color Shifting 

- Gamepad: Left stick - Movement, X/A - Jump, Left trigger - Hook, Right trigger - Color Shifting

Acerca del juego: Through Colors Project es un juego de plataforma en el que jugamos como un osito. El osito se perdió mientras buscaba un guantalete mágico. Luego de encontrarlo el lugar se convirtió en su enemigo. Los espirítus que protegían el guantalete se volvieron hostiles en su contra.
